page.title: 09ORGANISATIONS AND SOCIETIES
page.content: PITSFORD VILLAGE BOASTS A WEALTH OF SOCIETIES AND ORGANISATIONS FOR THE GENERAL ENTERTAINMENT OF THE POPULACE. ALL AGES ARE CATERED FOR - WITH THE POSSIBLE EXCEPTION OF THE VERY YOUNG WHOSE PARENTS NEED TO TAKE THEM TO THE NEXT VILLAGE TO FIND A PLAYGROUP. ELDERLY FOLK ENJOY THE PROVISION OF A THURSDAY CLUB; THE LADIES OF THE VILLAGE HAVE A THRIVING WOMEN'S INSTITUTE WHICH MEETS MONTHLY AND A MOTHERS UNION FOR THE CHURCH LADIES. YOUNGSTERS HAVE THE OPPORTUNITY TO ATTEND CUBS AND BROWNIES UP TO THE AGE OF ELEVEN, BUT MUST THEN TRAVEL TO A NEIGHBOURING VILLAGE TO ATTEND SCOUTS AND GIRL GUIDES. MANY FUNCTIONS ARE ALSO HELD IN THE VILLAGE HALL ON AN OCCASIONAL BASIS FOR THE ENTERTAINMENT OF VARIOUS SECTIONS OF THE COMMUNITY.
